meta.title: Whisker's Cove
meta.description: Embark on an odyssey through serene waters as you embrace the life of an aspiring angler. Master the art of fishing and unravel the secrets of the deep.

content.name: Gone Fishing
content.description: Different fishing classes to master, including Angler, Fly Fisher, Iron Noodler, and Ice Carver.

content.name: Ecological
content.description: In depth systems: overfishing, breeding, and weather can have permanent effects to the world.

content.name: Different Modes
content.description: Meditate, PvE, and Hardcore playstyles are available.  Each mode is unquie that offers a completely different experience.

meta.title: Gorgons Legend
meta.description: The consequences of your choices shape the world around you. A journey that explores the dualities of good and evil, intricately woven into the tapestry of Greek Mythology.

content.name: Adventures
content.description: As the game unfolders, you can play up to a total of 3 different characters, each with their own unique abilities and story.

content.name: Fast Paced
content.description: a mix of platformer with fast paced arcade action

content.name: Custom Builds
content.description: Customize and build each character with different attributes and abilities

meta.title: Isle of Zultiki
meta.description: Witness an enigmatic island, summoning souls from distant lands. These adventurers united by the island's allure, unfurl an epic saga of exploration and mystique.

content.name: Professions
content.description: Enjoy up to 12 different professions to choose from that feature different spells and builds to customize.

content.name: Spells
content.description: Uncover new spells and abilities as you level up.  Use them strategically to your advantage.

content.name: Customize
content.description: Build on your character's attributes and abilities to make them your own.
